:children.description: The contents of the dropdown section. Usually a list of `DropdownItem` components. (static)
:children.description_zh: 下拉部分的内容。通常是“DropdownItem”组件的列表。（静态）

key.description: The unique key for the dropdown item.

title.description: The title of the dropdown section.

textValue.description: A string representation of the item's contents, used for features like typeahead.
textValue.description_zh: 项目内容的字符串表示，用于headtypeahead等功能。

showDivider.description: Whether to show the divider between the groups.
showDivider.description_zh: 是否显示组之间的分隔线。

description.description: The description of the dropdown item.

startContent.description: The start content of the dropdown item.

endContent.description: The end content of the dropdown item. This is positioned after the shortcut and the selected icon.
endContent.description_zh: 下拉项目的结束内容。这位于快捷方式和所选图标之后。

selectedIcon.description: Custom icon to render when the item is selected.
selectedIcon.description_zh: 选择项目时要渲染的自定义图标。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown section slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为下拉部分插槽设置自定义类名。

itemClasses.description: Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown item slots.
itemClasses.description_zh: 允许为下拉项槽设置自定义类名。

DropdownItemSelectedIconProps.name: icon
DropdownItemSelectedIconProps.description: 当前图标，通常是勾号图标。

DropdownItemSelectedIconProps.name: isSelected
DropdownItemSelectedIconProps.description: 当前图标，通常是勾号图标。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The main slot for the dropdown section. It wraps all the other slots.
slots.description_zh: 下拉部分的主插槽。它包裹所有其他插槽。

slots.name: heading
slots.description: The title that is render on top of the section group.
slots.description_zh: 呈现在节组顶部的标题。

slots.name: divider
slots.description: The divider that is render between the groups. This is only visible when showDivider is true.
slots.description_zh: 在组之间呈现的分隔线。仅当 showDivider 为 true 时才可见。
